thumb.name: Sunny Day
thumb.verse: %3CB%3EColoring Sheets%3C/B%3E are a great activity for kids. just about anytime and anywhere. whether it%26#146;s in the classroom. at home on a rainy afternoon.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EYou'll Need:%3C/B%3E Paper. 8 1/2 x 11 inches. Crayons or washable markers.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EDirections:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3COL%3E%3CLI%3EClick %3CB%3EPersonalize and Print Your Project%3C/B%3E to open the Creative Workspace.%3C/LI%3E %3CLI%3EMake text changes as desired.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3EClick %3CB%3EPrint Project%3C/B%3E to send finished %3Cb%3EColoring Sheet%3C/b%3E to the printer. %3C/LI%3E%3C/OL%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3ETips:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EPrint your project on scrap paper first to check the alignment. spelling. and overall look of the project. Enhance the completed coloring sheet with glitter paint or stickers. Give kids crayons (or washable markers) and a coloring sheet. and watch their creativity come to life!%3CBR%3E

thumb.name: Bubble Truck

Enhance the completed coloring sheet with glitter paint or stickers. Give kids crayons (or washable markers) and a coloring sheet. and watch their creativity come to life!%3CBR%3E
